title: Evaluating Domain Generalization in Kitchen Utensils Classification
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Miguel Alfaro-Contreras, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: Study on domain generalization techniques applied to kitchen utensils classification tasks.
venue: Iberian Conference on Pattern Recognition and Image Analysis 2023 (108-118)

title: Efficient Approaches for Notation Assembly in Optical Music Recognition
authors: Carlos Penarrubia, Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Jose J. Valero-Mas, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: Research on efficient methods for assembling musical notation in Optical Music Recognition systems.
venue: 4th International Workshop on Reading Music Systems (2022)

title: End-to-End Graph Prediction for Optical Music Recognition
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Antonio Rios-Vila, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: End-to-end approach for graph prediction in Optical Music Recognition systems.
venue: 4th International Workshop on Reading Music Systems (2022)

title: Domain Adaptation for Document Image Binarization via Domain Classification
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Antonio Sánchez Hernández, Francisco J. Castellanos
description: Study on domain adaptation techniques for document image binarization using domain classification.
